name: Musings
description:
Play through various scenarios where your input leads the story forward or brings it to a halt.

Play your part on the short story and choose your actions carefully. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Only one tale available so far called "The Cabin".

Other ones are being written and developed to be later added. 

If you encounter any bugs feel free to comment here and I will check it out.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please leave a rating or comment if you can! It helps me understand what to create.
:)

Thank you for indulging in my musings.
